text: Another day stuck being meSo many people have told me the same exact thing  Accept myself  love myself  be myself  When you ve walked the path I have  Myself is all I ve ever had  No Mom  No Dad  no family and sure friends come and go  In the end  it s always been me left alone  And being alone with my thoughts through years of abandonment  chips away at your confidence and self esteem  Answers to impossible questions remain unanswered  Why didn t they want me  What did I do  Why does it seem like nobody cares  Self pity can only get you so much sympathy  that I have learned at  yrs  Pity  amp  sympathy are something I resent because it gives the false impression that I m unequal or not good enough  Eventually the self pity goes away except it s replaced with   Self hatred Self Doubt   Self Sabotage   Because logically there must be a reason they didn t want me  Perhaps I wasn t good enough in there opinion   Vitriol sets in Sour grapes become the mindset   Who needs them anyway  I don t need anyone  I ve only ever been able to depend on myself   Live with no expectations  Depend on no one isolate maintain   People begin to annoy you  their very presence is an inconvenience  Others successes become my own shortcomings  The what if s could go on for miles  Still maintain  I no longer fear death  but I don t welcome it either  It s life that I fear  this endless never ending empty life  Yes it s a view of pure melancholy  but when you ve lived through it it s simply just another day
summary: After years of abandonment, self-loathing and self-hatred replace self-pity with self-doubts. Self-hate is replaced by self-hating, self doubt and self sabotaging.
cleaned: year abandonment self loathing self hatred replace self pity self doubt self hate replace self hate self doubt self sabotaging

text: It seems to me that suicide is the only optionI m so tired of feeling like i am being thrashed around inside a turbo cycle washing machine  For a moment  I m at idle and i think everything will be fine  only to be tossed around again  I m so tired of being bipolar and having to hide the fact that i am two separate entities in one body  I am tired of constantly thinking of mutilating myself in any way possible and going through with it  only to hate myself more due to being covered in ugly scars  Im tired of feeling unlovable  Im tired of being worthless  I look in the mirror and cry because i see this disgusting face looking back at me  and i can t help but think of how exhausted i look  I m tired of running   miles a week in order to look  skinnier  when i still look overweight  I m so tired of feeling everything all at once  I think I m going to break up with my boyfriend because i can t get over the thought in my mind that he hates me  I don t want him to be hurt when i kill myself  so I d rather he be angry with me after i have broken up with him  I m so fucking exhausted and i have no where to go  I want so badly for someone to save me but it s not possible
summary: Suicide seems to be the only option for bipolar. She is tired of being bipolar and having to hide the fact that she is two separate entities in one body. She doesn't want to break up with her boyfriend because she thinks he hates her.
